name: Disscaveira 2
description:
Story :
One day the great ruby is about too be stolen by the great ancient bird Renoa. but you being the most bravest of the caveira clan leap into the bird in order to stop Renoa. as you struggle to obtain the ruby back Renoa drop you into the wildernest. can you obtain the stolen ruby back.

This game was made for the Lowrez jam 2020 and was the sequel from the prior jam.

Important :
at the moment the browser version is not quite stable i advice you to use the download version as it more stable and the save sistem is working.

Keyboard Control :

  • Z :  Jump/accept
  • X:  Shot/Cancel/Delete mode
  • Arrow key : Movement/Up for jumping as well
  • Enter : Pause

Gamepad Control : (only been tested with xbox controller)

  • Button A :  Jump/accept
  • Button X:  Shot/Cancel/Delete mode
  • Dpad : Movement/Up for jumping as well
  • Menu Button : Pause
